author: quillaudits
content:
Gm folks 

The first half of 2025 has been an absolute shitshow for hacks â€“ way worse than all of 2024 combined. 

Our team just dropped a full report on every single exploit from January to June 2025, breaking down the vulnerabilities and, more importantly, how to avoid getting rekt.

https://www.quillaudits.com/reports/crypto-exploits-h1-report-2025

We're already gearing up for the next half's report. If you're a fellow security researcher and want to collab with the QuillAudits team, hit us up!
